name: Sinful Clash
description:
SinFul Clash

Welcome to the Sinful Clash, where to live you have to kill. Try to kill as many as you can and try to survive the maximum waves possible!

|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|___|

Controls:

  • Arrow keys/WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim and shoot
A game made on Godot 3.3.2
